overview_of_class: This course is designed to help you improve the pronunciation, intonation, and fluency of your spoken French, as well as to give you an overall understanding of the phonetic system of the contemporary French language.
name: French Phonetics
topic: Theory and Practice of French Sounds
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description

Read & Discuss in language
subject: FRENCH
